question: What is the name of the hackathon supported by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, which aims to find solutions for overcoming COVID-19 pandemic?
explanation:
An online hackathon to find working solutions for overcoming COVID-19 pandemic, called ‘Hack the Crisis- India’ has been recently launched.
This hackathon is being organised by ‘Hack A Cause - India’ and ‘FICCI Ladies Organization Pune’. It is supported by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology. Minister of State of HRD and IT Sanjay Dhotre who launched the hackathon said that over 2,000 teams and 15,000 participants will be participating in 48-hour hackathon.
